titles: The confession or declaration of the ministers or pastors which in the United Provinces are called Remonstrants, concerning the chief points of Christian religion
Confessio sive declaratio sententiae pastorum qui in Foederato Belgio Remonstrantes vocantur super praecipuis articulis religionis Christianae. English
author: Remonstrantse Broederschap.
Episcopius, Simon, 1583-1643.
Taylor, Thomas, 1576-1632.
notes: Translation of Confessio sive declaratio sententiae pastorum qui in Foederato Belgio Remonstrantes vocantur super praecipuis articulis religionis Christianae.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
